meanings.definition: To spread or smear a substance thinly over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She schmeered a bit of butter on her toast.
meanings.sent2: He schmeered the paint across the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The cat schmeered its paw with mud and left tiny prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The sun schmeered its golden rays through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The chef schmeered the sauce delicately on the plate.

meanings.definition: To apply a thick layer of a substance onto something.
meanings.sent1: Mom schmeered a generous amount of jam on the bread.
meanings.sent2: The worker schmeered the glue on the broken pieces.
meanings.sent3: The child schmeered the glue on his hands and got stuck to the table.
meanings.sent4: The storm schmeered the snow over the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The baker schmeered the frosting on the cake smoothly.

meanings.definition: To cover or coat something with a thick or sticky substance.
meanings.sent1: She schmeered the peanut butter on the crackers.
meanings.sent2: The gardener schmeered the fertilizer on the plants.
meanings.sent3: The prankster schmeered the doorknob with honey.
meanings.sent4: The artist schmeered the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The child schmeered the glue on the paper to make a collage.
